class.name: AnimationNodeStateMachinePlayback
class.description: Allows control of [AnimationTree] state machines created with [AnimationNodeStateMachine]. Retrieve with [code]$AnimationTree.get("parameters/playback")[/code]. [codeblocks] [gdscript] var state_machine = $AnimationTree.get("parameters/playback") state_machine.travel("some_state") [/gdscript] [csharp] var stateMachine = GetNode<AnimationTree>("AnimationTree").Get("parameters/playback").As<AnimationNodeStateMachinePlayback>(); stateMachine.Travel("some_state"); [/csharp] [/codeblocks]

method.name: get_current_length
method.description: Returns the current state length. [b]Note:[/b] It is possible that any [AnimationRootNode] can be nodes as well as animations. This means that there can be multiple animations within a single state. Which animation length has priority depends on the nodes connected inside it. Also, if a transition does not reset, the remaining length at that point will be returned.

method.name: get_current_node
method.description: Returns the currently playing animation state. [b]Note:[/b] When using a cross-fade, the current state changes to the next state immediately after the cross-fade begins.

method.name: get_current_play_position
method.description: Returns the playback position within the current animation state.

method.name: get_fading_from_node
method.description: Returns the starting state of currently fading animation.

method.name: get_travel_path
method.description: Returns the current travel path as computed internally by the A* algorithm.

method.name: is_playing
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if an animation is playing.

method.name: next
method.description: If there is a next path by travel or auto advance, immediately transitions from the current state to the next state.

method.name: start
method.description: Starts playing the given animation. If [param reset] is [code]true[/code], the animation is played from the beginning.

method.name: travel
method.description: Transitions from the current state to another one, following the shortest path. If the path does not connect from the current state, the state machine's default transition will be used to jump to the destination state.

method.name: jump
method.description: Transitions from the current state directly to another one, using the state machine's default transition if a direct connection is not available.

method.name: queue_travel
method.description: Appends a series of transitions from the last state in the current travel path to another one, following the shortest path. If the path does not connect, the state machine's default transition will be used to jump to the destination state.

method.name: queue
method.description: Queues the requested state, using the state machine's default transition if a direct connection is not available.
